Control Statement: The organization: a. Defines mission/business processes with consideration for information security and the resulting risk to organizational operations, organizational assets, individuals, other organizations, and the Nation; andb. Determines information protection needs arising from the defined mission/business processes and revises the processes as necessary, until achievable protection needs are obtained
